content: Welcome! Here you can learn the rules, get answers to your questions by reading the FAQ, and find out more about the community thatâ€™s growing around the challenge.
Code minimum an hour every day for the next 100 days
Tweet your progress every day with the #100DaysOfCode hashtag. Learn more about the rules
If you made the decision to commit to the challenge, Click here to tweet it to the world, making yourself accountable and taking your resolve to the next level!
